short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suite of tools to improve the user experience on https://twocansandstring.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Third Can improves TwoCans by adding various new features, including:
- Pronouns
- Bring back the "Skip for Now" button
- Hotkeys
- Confirm dialogs
- LaTeX
- Finally making the Saved Questions page useful
- And many more!
